black_cards.text: The apprentice's long hair got caught and _______ before anyone could reach _______.
The family requested a closed casket after seeing _______.
The dashcam footage shows the crane operator _______ right before _______.
The 911 operator went silent after hearing _______.
The safety training video now includes actual footage of _______, _______, and _______.
The victim's children kept asking why daddy was _______.
The trapped worker's phone recorded _______ until _______.
The trauma counselor quit after witnessing _______.
The veteran EMT vomited when they discovered _______.
The victim's wedding ring was found inside _______ next to _______.
The machine kept operating for hours after _______ until _______.
The pregnant worker's last words were _______.
The rescue team found _______ still warm beside _______.
The victim's mother identified them by _______.
The janitor discovered _______ mixed with _______ in the morning.
The suicide note simply mentioned _______.
The worker's last selfie showed _______ in the background.
The coworker's PTSD was triggered by _______ reminding them of _______.
The victim's child drew a picture of _______.
The last text message mentioned _______ before _______.

white_cards.text: A child's drawing of daddy's accident
The exact moment a family becomes eligible for workers' comp
A voicemail cut off by screaming
A lunchbox that will never be opened
The sound of a toddler asking when mommy's coming home
A positive pregnancy test in a dead worker's locker
A half-finished Father's Day card
The last family photo before the accident
A wedding ring embedded in machinery
The unfinished text message: 'I love y'
A phone playing a child's voicemail on repeat
The exact moment of realizing no one's coming to help
A birthday cake in the break room that will never be eaten
The look in their eyes when they knew it was over
A Christmas bonus check soaked in blood
The sound of a mother identifying her child's remains
A family photo falling from lifeless fingers
The last breath forming the word 'sorry'
A child's drawing found in the victim's pocket
The moment between accident and agony
A colleague's scream of recognition
The slow realization that the screaming is your own
A final paycheck delivered to a grieving widow
The empty chair at a child's graduation
A retirement party invitation never sent
The last kiss goodbye that morning
A 'World's Best Dad' mug shattered in the wreckage
The moment between consciousness and death
A safety poster splattered with their coworker's blood
The sound of a spouse's world shattering
A half-eaten lunch that became a last meal
The exact moment hope turns to horror
A timecard that will never be punched again
The last joke they ever told
A colleague's mental breakdown during identification
The silence after the screaming stops
A 'See You Tonight' text that became a lie
The moment between hope and acceptance
An anniversary gift that will never be given
The sound of a child asking about heaven
A promotion letter delivered to a funeral
The last family dinner they'll ever have
A 'Happy Birthday Daddy' drawing never received
The exact moment a dream job becomes a nightmare
A locker full of family photos to be cleaned out
The last 'I love you' left unsaid
A safety violation that orphaned three children
The moment between accident and realization
A coffee mug that will stay full forever
The sound of a phone ringing at an empty desk
A family vacation never taken
The last photo on their phone
A college fund that became funeral expenses
The moment between life and death
A safety meeting scheduled for tomorrow
The last time their children saw them smile
An empty seat at the dinner table
The sound of a widow's first night alone
A mortgage payment due after the funeral
The moment cost-cutting became manslaughter
